Valve просто тренеровались в разработке игр и выпустили это... Я купил набор игр Valve по большой скидке, и за "Бесплатно" впринципе не жалко, но покупать я бы такое не стал!

Booted the game up to find (1) active player on a random open server.  Joined and they were throwing Discs, Bouncing them off the barrier and hitting themselfs with it. Got off about 5 mins later as it was just getting weird at that point. a few hours later I remembered my brother has this game aswell so we boot it up I host a private game and invite him as hes looking for a lobby he says " Oh hey! Theres 1 other person playing!" and he joined them to find the same exact guy doing it but this time running around. 10 out of 10. 

But for real tho unless you have friends/community to play with dont bother cause it wont be fun doing nothing in a lobby alone.. well I guess I cant really say that 100% of the time as the guy above was having a blast.

Ricochet es un juego bastante interensante si piensas en lo que se basa su historia y en sus personajes. 
Bueno mi reseña va empezar hablando del modo campaña.
En primer lugar nuestro personaje llamado Lobao va al espacio donde se accidenta y encuentra una base extraterrestre que lo rescata y evita su inminente muerte, este agradecido con los aliens que lo salvaron, decide apoyarlos en contra de sus mayores enemigos, los Roys.Esta trama aunque suene bastante cliche tienes sus puntos que hacen ver esta historia espacial como una historia diferente a las otras como Dead Space.Unos de los puntos a destacar son los personajes secundarios tales como Yasuo o Shrek los cuales son personajes fundamentales en el desarrollo de la trama del juego ya que ayudan al personaje principal en bastantes aspectos como cuando Shrek le entrego una gema del infinito a Lobao y a su banda de amigos llamado Cheiro de Calcinha justo en el momento cuando tenemos que pelear con el jefe final lo cual aporta bastante a la mecanica de la mision.
Tambien vale destacar la ambientacion del juego, tanto visual y sonoro. Las escenas del espacio y de las naves espaciales son increibles, mi parte favorita hablando de eso fue cuando Lobao encontro a los guardianes de la galaxia, esa panoramica fue genial. volviendo al tema el espacio se ve estupendo(aun mas si lo juegos en HD).
La banda sonora tambien es buena ya que participa la orquesta de Star Wars, La banda Brazileña Cheiro de Calchina( la que le da la voz a los personajes del juego) y Metallica lo cual genera una gran experiencia audivisual.

[h1]Ricochet / Rebotar[/h1]
Una modificacion del Half Life lanzado en el 2000. El juego no tiene ni historia ni lore, solamente son personajes lanzandose Discos en el espacio sobre unas plataformas que le hacen saltar de una a otra. Por el mapa se encontraran Power Ups para mejorar su disco, una de ellas es incluso [b]Decapitar[/b] al enemigo. Comparando los diferentes juegos de la compañia se podria decir que es el peor juego de Valve. Pero no por ello el menos importante.
[h1]Lo Bueno:[/h1]
[list]
[*][b]El juego sabiendo su epoca y ganas que le dio la empresa a este proyecto se puede decir que este juego es muy basico y sencillo, no necesita mas de lo que se muestra, es sencillo, rapido y sobre todo divertido.[/b]
[*][b]Es una modificación que se puede modificar. La comunidad no deja de hacer mapas, me he encontrado hasta un Castillo. Lo que digo es que gracias a su sencillez cualquiera con su imaginacion puede crear cualquier cosa, tampoco nos pasemos diciendo que es un Minecraft 2.0 pero se entiende.[/b]
[*][b]La variedad de Power Ups.[/b]
[*][b]El personaje no puede saltar, por ello para moverse con facilidad, hay que usar el Bunny Hop al saltar entre plataformas. Lo que hace que en otros juegos de la misma empresa se mejore su habilidad de movimiento en el terreno. [/b]
[*][b]El juego es optimizable hasta en una Calculadora.[/b]
[/list]
[h1]Lo Malo:[/h1]
[list]
[*][b]Sus servidores estan simplemente Muertos. Pero si quereis podeis descargar los mapas que querais en la web o crearlos vosotros mismos.[/b]
[*][b]Sus sonidos son muy antiambiental.[/b]
[*][b]El giro que da la camara al caerse al infinito, puede marear un poco.[/b]
[/list]
[quote=Marloncha]Lo seguire esperando, igual que el Half Life 2 Ep 3: 
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=Ub2yndMZAnM[/quote]

На самом деле считать игру хорошей не стоит. Игра не очень для этих времён. Для 2000-ого года игра была привлекательной. Сейчас есть более лучшие игры, чем эта простая игра. Ты постоянно будешь умирать, выжить сложно.

This game is mostly known as a dead game.
Thanks to the negligence by the developer, which was deserved (they tried), it never saw the light at the end of the tunnel to become a classic, amognst other games such as Death Stranding.

However, still deep in the game there is an intrigue, a morbid curiosity in which you question the meaning of the game world and its characters.

You play as a man in a generic looking suit of armor fighting other men in generic looking suits of armor.
The fighting is being done by throwing discs at each other that can **RICOCHET** off of certain barriers. There are also upgrades that improve those discs.

But when there is a time where you don't fight, you look around. You notice that the plane of existence only takes place in an empty void with an abyss streching down to infinity.

And if you gaze into the abyss, the abyss gazes also into you.
Give us a sequel, Gaben ༼ つ ◕_◕ ༽つ

This game basically boils down to "the floor is lava" with frisbees that can cut people's heads off or punt them into said lava. Except the lava is a bottomless void. The controls are simple: WASD for movement, and the mouse buttons for throwing discs. There is no jump or duck function; instead, platforms have jump points that kick you from platform to platform. Scoring a direct hit and kicking another player off a platform into the void is worth one point, as is a decapitation. If your disc bounces once and then hits a player, that's two points. Two bounces is three points, and I imagine this pattern continues, though I've never managed more than two bounces.

This game is great for fast-paced action, although as other reviews have pointed out, not many people play anymore. That being said, I whole-heartedly recommend this game, and at $5, it is an absolute steal.

The gameplay is amazing. Combat system is exquisite. There are many beautiful things I can say about this game, such as:
-Very big community
-Very nice community
-Amazing power ups that you can use to your advantage
-Memorable characters
-Astonoshing graphics
-Great variety of maps
-Amazing gameplay mechanics

The game is very difficult, probably even more difficult than Garfield Kart, but you will get better with practice. It is amazing with friends, so you should convince others to get it as well. You don't need friends to play though, for there is a big community of bots. The bots are not toxic, making for a great community. I did have some difficulties, for you have to change mouse settings in the options in order to look around, other wise arrow keys are perfectly fine (I don't prefer them). The character models have great personality, with voicelines such as, "AAAAAAAAAH." That's it, but that voice line means a lot to me. The map is very bright and colorful, but not to the point where it is overwhelming. There are bumpers that you can ricochet your discs off of, which gives this game its name. I almost forgot to mention the discs, the main weapon in this game, which you use to bump your friends off the map, granting you a point. There are very little cons. Actually, there is only one con, and that con is there is no ricochet 2 yet. Everyone asks valve for half-life 3, even though this amazing concept of a game deserves a sequel. I wish valve gave this game another chance, for it is full of life. My friend and I have a clan in this game, called {KROCK}, which everyone should join, because we know this game will be an e-sport in a couple of years, so we need to make a team with very experienced players. Ricochet is a beauty of a game. It makes me want to sing Einen Jodler hor ich gern by Takeo Ischi (created originally by Franzl Lang).  I would rate this game 10/10, definitely worth the buy.

öncelikle selamün aleyküm. bu oyunu valve complete pack ile aldım ve ne olduğunu anlamamıştım. Gonsez isimli arkadaşımız sayesinde oyunu az çok anladım ve az önce girip oynadım. oyun eğlenceliydi ama sadece 1 ya da  2 tane dolu server var ve bu oyunu çok sıkıcı yapıyor. bence herkesin bu oyuna bir şans vermesi lazım. oyunun mantığı biraz garip ve şahsen bu düşme sırasındaki animasyon gözleri çok acıtabilir. çünkü bu tür animasyonlar epilepsi hastalarını aşırı derecede rahatsız edecek derecede ve ben epilepsi hastası olmamama rağmen gözlerim hala acıyor çünkü oyunu bunu yazmadan 2 dk önce kapattım ve eğlenceliydi. oyundaki mantığı anlamak yeni oynayanlar için garip gelebilir (mesela ben :D). yaşım 13 olduğu için bu tür oyunları bilmiyorum ve bende bunu yeni çıkacak (belki çıkmıştır yanlış bilgi olmasın) valvenin kart oyunu gibi sanmıştım ama daha derin ve güzel bir oynanışı var. eğer yaşınız benim gibiyse eski oyunları teker teker almak yerine valve complete pack indirime girdiğinde alabilirsiniz. steam platformu valveye ait olduğu için kendi paketlerinde ve oyunlarında aşırı indirimler olmakta mesela yaz indirimlerinde valve complete pack 358 liradan 26 liraya düşmüştü :) gerisini siz düşünün.. okuyan herkese eyvallah görüşmek üzere Allaha emanet olun :) ;)

Valve Complete Pack ile satın aldığım, başlarda hiçbir şey beceremeyip inatla oynayıp efsanesi olduğum nostaljik oyun...

Oyunda eğilme,zıplama hatta aim kontrolü yok. 

Yorum yazan birçok arkadaş, platformdan platforma zıplarken yön tuşlarına bastıklarında uzay boşluğuna düştüklerini söyleyip olumsuz yorumlarda bulunmuş. Bu aslında oyunun bir hatası değil aksine oyunu daha eğlenceli hale getiren bir özelliğidir. Bu sayede platformdan platforma zıplarken sadece sağa, sola ya da karşı platforma değil çarpraz platformlara da ulaşabiliyoruz. Böylelikle hem rakibin disklerinden kaçabiliyoruz hem de daha avantajlı platformlara geçip rakibe üstünlük kurabiliyoruz.

Oyunda rakibi platformdan düşürmek çok zevkli geliyor. Özellikle de arkadaş ortamınızda  oynuyorsanız kahkahaların ardı arkası kesilmeyecektir.

Ricochet je celkovo nedorobený a odfláknutý mód, ktorý si aj tak väčšina ľudí kúpi iba vo Valve Complete Pack alebo Counter-Strike 1 Anthology a náhodou si ju zahrá.

+ GoldSrc engine
+ nápad

- odfláknuté
- menej hráčov, než si myslíte

+/- cena

4/10
